"Is this true? i have hdtv but i always download a pal versions of games.How ntsc works good on hdtv,is it all ok? "

In the past Pal and NTSC weren't compatable because each has a different standard for resolutions. However HDtv's have a universal standard for resolution so they work just fine.

@ grahammc0 - Use Winrar and click on the R00 ( it will auto unpack the others) extract the .iso and.dvd (if there is a .dvd, run the iso thru abgx360 to ensure it has stealth files and then use a burning program that has a layer break option like imgburn or clonecd and load the .dvd file and burn at 2x-2.4x speed. Also use Verbatim DVDDL whenever possable, I got some Memorex that work like crap even when burned at 1x
